markdownRemark.html: The ReInHerit Digital Collection is a collaborative project developed by three partner museums, the Bank of Cyprus Cultural Foundation, the Graz Museum, and the Museum of Cycladic Art. It is an open collection, which offers the possibility for museums across Europe and around the world to submit digital cultural heritage objects. Find out more about the digital collection, its concept, aims, and the technical background in the following sections.
